title: Constraint-Based Surfing Training Methodology: Enhancing Intermediate Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic surfing techniques and equipment usage
context.additional_context: Flexible learning design for office workers (administrative/managerial) to integrate with job responsibilities

learning_goals: Accurately explain 80% or more of psychological elements required for surfing performance (concentration, risk management)
Design and implement five or more physical warm-up routines tailored to wave conditions
Analyze three core mechanisms of surfing movements (balance, timing, and power) using virtual simulation tools
Develop a project-based case study demonstrating three practical examples of integrating land-based and water-based training
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
